PackageOracle.name: DA_COVERAGE_AREA
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_COVERAGE_AREA
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.48.479240000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,coverage_area_cd IN VARCHAR2
,coverage_area_nm IN VARCHAR2
,coverage_area_desc IN VARCHAR2
,geographical_area_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,coverage_area_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_coverage_area;

body.name: DA_COVERAGE_AREA
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_COVERAGE_AREA
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.48.489202000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,coverage_area_cd IN VARCHAR2
,coverage_area_nm IN VARCHAR2
,coverage_area_desc IN VARCHAR2
,geographical_area_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_coverage_area.add, parms=' || coverage_area_cd || '|' || coverage_area_nm || '|' || coverage_area_desc || '|' || geographical_area_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_coverage_area a
(
a.coverage_area_cd
,a.coverage_area_nm
,a.coverage_area_desc
,a.geographical_area_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.coverage_area_cd
,add.coverage_area_nm
,add.coverage_area_desc
,add.geographical_area_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_coverage_area.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,coverage_area_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_coverage_area.del, parms=' || coverage_area_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_coverage_area a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.coverage_area_cd = del.coverage_area_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_coverage_area.del');

END del;

END da_coverage_area;
